entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
